```{r}
data("mtcars")
library(s20x)
str(mtcars)

fit <- lm(mpg ~., mtcars)

summary(fit)
plot(fit)
normcheck(fit)

co4.df <- read.table("CapeGrim.CO2.quarterly.txt", header = TRUE)
##HW multiplicative
co4.ts = ts(co4.df$CO2[1:68], frequency = 4, start = 2000)
co4.multi.holtfit = HoltWinters(co4.ts, seasonal = "multiplicative")
co4.multi.holtfit
plot(co4.multi.holtfit)

bunch <- rnorm(150, mean = 0, sd = 5)
class(bunch)

library(tidyverse)
bunch %>% enframe(., name = "year", value = "numbers") %>% ts(., start = 1949, frequency = 12) %>% plot(.)

```
